mapper.select: select qp.packet_id,qp.packet_name,qp.packet_type,qp.packet_prompt,qp.media_id,plpt.packet_id from question_packet qp right join (select pl.plan_id,pt.packet_id from plan pl left join plan_templet pt on pl.plan_id=pt.plan_id where pl.plan_id=#{plan_id}) plpt on qp.packet_id=plpt.packet_id
mapper.update: update plan_instance set instance_judge=0 where token=#{token};
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM plan_instance where instance_judge=#{params.instance_judge }
